We had the best week ever at Michelle's "Tamarac Lake Hideaway" and can't wait to book it again for next summer. The "water & woods" part of it was awesome! We brought our fishing boat and went out onto the water. Caught a few fish and then headed over to Lake Franklin just a few miles down the road where we caught even more. The short 2 min walk to the lake was what we needed to stretch our legs, enjoy our morning joe, and enjoy the outdoors while listening to the birds sing. My husband and I took the double kayak out and saw a momma loon carrying a baby on her back, so neat! The property is on a dead-end gravel road and is so peaceful, especially at night when we watched the fireflies, listened to the frog's croak, and roasted smores over the campfire. One night we drove to Zorbaz on Pelican Lake hoping to get a glimpse of Josh Dumel - Ugh, no luck this time. We highly recommend "Tamarac Lake Hideaway" for your next retreat as we had a very memorable family vacation

Without a doubt the most affordable and secluded getaway from Fargo daily life. Deep in the heart of lake country for those looking to getaway for a weekend fishing trip (BYO Boat), or they have a double kayak on site for you to use with just a brief walk to Tamarac lake. The seclusion and relaxation of glamping made this an easy choice for me, being able to enjoy some much needed nature and settle in for the night with a camp fire or some bbq on the large deck. Being close to Detroit lakes made it great for those like me who tend to forget to pack the necessities, we swung by the coveted zorbaz after a trip to town to replace the toiletries and groceries I forgot to pack. Excellent value stay in such a great part of Minnesota!

This was a great spot for our annual family gathering! Plenty of room for everyone with an awesome fire pit and grassy space for the kids to play! The hosts were very responsive and helpful. This place was so perfect for our crew of 13. There were plenty of linens, dishes, and amenities for our large group. The yard is gorgeous and there was lots of space for parking. any time I had a question, I got a prompt response. check-in was flawless. the place was perfect for our group. plenty of spacious bedrooms, plenty of bathrooms. beds were comfy. the table was too small for our group to eat together, but it was fairly big. everything was very well stocked. one thing we noticed, only because we had a few folks struggle with stairs, is there was no railing on the staircase. the fireplace area was very nice and spacious for us all. it was very quiet and peaceful. we walked around the area, and it was very calming. would definitely come back.
Had a great stay and would stay again!

This was a perfect place for my employees to stay while working , they are used to hotels , so they loved having a place that felt like home where they could cook and not have to eat out after work ! Thank you !
Awesome place very nice
Awesome place to stay. We did enjoyed much. The only missing piece was there was no dishwasher otherwise everything was at place. Thank you so much for hosting us.

We stayed here for a retreat for our college student ministry. It was a wonderful location away from our campus. House was well stocked with everything we needed, and the rooms were perfect. Excellent in every aspect super comfortable and cozy we enjoy every moment of our stay at the property

Nice, clean, small apartment located downtown Fergus Falls. Quiet, safe location. Restaurants and bars within walking distance. No issues using the keypad to get into the building or apartment. Parking is located in a lot about half a block away (just a heads up). Would stay here again.

Kaitlyn’s AirBnB is just as pictured! Getting to/in the location was extremely easy and the street was very private with low traffic. Perfect for a couples retreat/anniversary in the area! Great place very clean
Wonderful apartment and great location! Plan to stay in again in the future.

Kaitlyn’s place was great for the 1 night we spent in Fergus Falls. It might be a bit small for more than 1-2 people.

Beautifully decorated!

It was a very well decorated apartment. The bed was very comfortable and the sheets were very soft.

I did not like that I needed to do all of the pre-cleaning such as taking sheets of the bed.
I went to get dishes out of the cupboard and they were not well washed.
My biggest complaint was the smell. It was overwhelming with perfume smell from the glade plug ins. I did unplug them but that smell takes time to go away and my allergies were going insane.
Overall if not for the smell I would stay again.

The perfect cozy spot for a couples getaway! We stayed here for an anniversary trip- Perfect Minnesota staycation. The time and effort that went into making this apartment beautiful, cozy, and trendy did not go unnoticed! In walking distance to many great places and easily drivable to other nearby destinations (state parks, breweries, wineries, movie theatre). Only “complaint” was that the front door lock took a bit of getting used to and was finicky to open up but we weren’t in and out of the building too many times for it to really effect our overall stay or impression of the place. Would stay here again in a heartbeat!

Kaitlyn’s place is fantastic! Very nicely appointed and impeccably clean. The neighborhood is quaint with nice shops and restaurants all within walking distance. Kaitlyn could not have been more responsive and down right delightful! Thank you for the enjoyable stay.

The space was exactly as pictured and described. Spotless, with everything we needed for our stay. Cute place! The pictures make it look bigger than what it is. It worked for our short 1 night stay. Very clean!
Very cute, clean, and conveniently located downtown Fergus. We would definitely stay again!

We really enjoyed Kaitlyn's apartment. Very clean and decorated so cute. Really homey and comfortable. Great communication and such clear instructions for entry. Definitely will book again when we are back visiting family.

really sweet cozy apartment at a great price. Thoroughly enjoyed our stay.
Great little apartment that was perfect for a week stay in Fergus for work! Thanks for being a great host Kaitlyn!

I always keep my stays very tidy but to pay a good cleaning fee and have a long list at check out was tedious. On of the many items on the list was , The trash had to be taken out a few flights of stairs and down the alleyway outside. doesn't look like much from the outside, but it's a really nice place! I appreciated that the AC was on when I arrived.

Adorable, cozy, and well-appointed apartment that was just perfect for our needs. Kaitlyn was very helpful with several changes to our dates, which was very appreciated. The apartment is decorated and furnished with style and the bed and linens were very comfortable.

Great place to stay in downtown Fergus Falls—the laundry was a big help.

Classy place.

Such a cute place! Easy to find and super clean! Comfortable bed—I haven’t slept that good in years! Parking was a little walk but worth it!
Great place! Enjoyed our time visiting family and friends in the area. This was a great hub to work from.

Adorable cozy spot right downtown. Very nicely decorated with everything you might need. I appreciated the cleanliness and comfy bedding and towels. Close to shops and across the street from the Viking Cafe. Would definitely stay again.

Loved this stay!! Pictures did not do this place justice!! Perfect for a couple who wants to explore Fergus Falls. Multiple antique shops in walking distance. Must try Uncle Eddies Ice Cream across the street. Perfect place for an affordable trip!!

If you’re going to be visiting Fergus Falls for any amount of time, whether it’s a day or a week, this is the place to book your stay. Great location, spotless interior, excellent communication with Bill. They did not miss a single detail, can’t say enough good things. 10x better than any hotel.
Very clean, comfortable and felt very safe

This was the most pleasant stay I have yet had in an AirB&B! Bill was always there for me, in anticipation of my housing needs throughout my stay, as a landlord and as a friend. In the living room, the wall hangings are historical framed photos telling the story of the apartment and the immediate vicinity and how it developed after the great cyclone of 1919. My husband and I stayed with our 10 month old over Thanksgiving weekend while visiting family nearby. The apartment was exactly as pictured, if not better! Bill had the apartment clean, spotless, well organized, and very user friendly and intuitive. Bill has treated me like family, very thoughtful and considerate. The overall experience was so much better than I had anticipated. Bill often goes out of his way to accommodate me to smooth my stay!

Peaceful and clean space. We enjoyed hiking at a nearby state park, a local brewery, local restaurants, and the river walk. 10/10 recommend! Thanks for the great space!

Great place to stay. Immaculate space nicely redone with tons of thoughtful touches. Location downtown was amazing. Wish I could have stayed longer.

Beautiful space centrally located in walking to distance to all sorts of things! Very well decorated as well as extremely clean. I did a lot of cooking and they had everything I needed! Lovely space to stay!

Nothing bad to say at all. Top notch place. They go above and beyond. We will definitely be staying there again. Highly recommend this place. Will not be disappointed.

Fantastic airbnb. One of the most spacious, clean apartments we’ve had the pleasure of staying at. Fantastic value for the price. If we’re ever in the area again we will definitely stay here again.

The apartment is impeccable: it encompasses a historical but yet modern feel. It is so spacious and well maintained. Secondly, I was shocked literally the apartment is near everything (top restaurants, Viking cafe, breweries, movie theater, wine stores): it it’s the ultimate location, you can literally walk to everywhere. Thirdly , quite frankly the value that I got is more than the price I paid for: this apartment is so well priced and to be honest should be priced higher, because it provides so much value. To summarize: I highly recommend this apartment.

There's enough bathroom space for everyone in the group-which is frequently lacking in other rentals. There's more than enough towels, hot tub towels, and beach towels for everyone-and every drawer/closet is labeled for easy access to supplies. The game room is fabulous, the hot tub is fabulous, the sandbox and playhouse/swingset was great for the kids. We so appreciated having the paddleboat, kayaks and canoe-we kayaked all over Swan Lake. They responded promptly to any questions we had and kept us informed of directions, access, and anything else we needed to know during our stay. The welcome basket with snacks and coffee from a local roaster was a really nice touch. Our only regret was that we weren't staying longer. It went by so fast! I would highly recommend this place for large groups-you will create wonderful "forever" memories here.
